title: My mouse won't work
body: I downloaded LoL a few minutes ago and I just entered the tutorial, and my mouse won't show up at all. Can someone tell me how to fix this? I'm currently on Windows 10.

replies.body: I'd recommend giving your PC a quick reboot in case that was causing the issue. If you still experience this, please let me know what mouse you're using and if you're using any sort of program with that mouse for your settings.
